song.title: Fuck Your Horse
song.info:
Based on "Just Can't Get Enough" by Depeche Mode
This has been modified a little, to reduce the stereo separation.
"Unbearable on headphones." Well, there's nothing I can do about that :P
Converted to .wav with VLC's file output module. Adjusted stereo with Audacity, mixed each channel into the other at -12dB. Converted to mp3 with lame -h -b 256.
Real title of this song in the Digital Force musicdisk is "Surprise"
